tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_blocks (
    block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    num_transactions INT NOT NULL,
    miner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 4)
);

CREATE TABLE block_details (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    block_date TIMESTAMP,
    miner_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    gas_fee DECIMAL(18, 4),
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
  block_number INT,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE block_information (
  block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  block_hash VARCHAR(255),
  block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  miner_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT,
  analysis_result TEXT,
  analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT,
  previous_transaction_id INT,
  history_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  block_number INT,
  transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
  sender_address VARCHAR(255),
  receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  block_number INT,
  sender_address_id INT,
  receiver_address_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sender_address_id) REFERENCES addresses(address_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (receiver_address_id) REFERENCES addresses(address_id)
);
